description:
Developing software at the speed of fast-changing technologies and growing services requires clear, easy-to-maintain, and highly scalable design methods.

Domain-Driven Design (DDD) is a proven,
software development methodology.

We'll walk you through the basic concepts of DDD and learn how you can implement DDD using Python.

Shindong County
I'm a back-end developer who predominantly uses the Python web framework. I strive to be a better value provider to the world through technology. I am interested in software design and system architecture. I have a technical blog (qu3vipon.com).
title: PyCon KR 2023 Python Domain Driven Design Donghyun Shin
